current_contact.agency: NC Ofc of the Chief Med Exmnr

case_circumstances: This gentleman was found in an open-wooded lot behind the BB&T bank by a surveyor near a residential area.  He was known to be homeless and had been sleeping in the woods for approximately 2 years.   He had never been a patron of the local homeless shelter which had been in operation for the previous 4 to 5 years.  Many attempts were made locally to identify this man.
case_clothing_on_body: 3 heavy topcoats, 5 layers of shirt material, a pair of pants, no underclothes; close to 3000$ in varying denominations, packed in plastic bags and in the lining and pockets of topcoats.
case_footwear: heavy socks, and leather, laced field boots.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
